text: Fomɨra Janes ko Jambres aning Mosesɨn apanimɨn iti moghɨn, gumazir kaba guizɨn akamɨn apanim gami. Ezɨ men nɨghnɨziba deragha ingarir puvatɨzɨma me nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn itir puvatɨ.(3:8) Judaba kamaghɨn eghara ghaze, Janes ko Jambres, kar Mosesɨn dughiamɨn ikezir Isipɨn Atrivimɨn ganganir gumazimningɨn ziamning. Nɨ Kisim Bek 7:22 ko 9:11ɨn gan.
